channel.title: REQ 508 most if not all monster animations plox
channel.description: Hey guys sorry about my recent bitch-fit i threw a week ago if you read it... lol sorry Anyways i find a list of monster anims but its not all of them. Anyone have a list i can use? And idk what section to put this in so can a mod move this if im in the wrong section.

item.title: REQ 508 most if not all monster animations plox
item.dc:creator: @flamehair9 flamehair9
item.description:
@flamehair9 wrote:

Davidi2:

Good luck with that. The amount of known animations is semi-limited, there are a few lists compiled but they are certainly not ‘most’ NPCS, more like about 50 max

Damn, ok. thanks

Read full topic
item.source: REQ 508 most if not all monster animations plox
